# Trent Brewster — LLMs.txt
Version: 2025-11-19
Owner: Trent Brewster
Contact: hello@trentbrew.com
Homepage: https://trentbrew.com/
Repository: https://github.com/trentbrew/trentbrew.com

Usage-Policy:
  Training (research & inference assistants): Allowed with attribution "Trent Brewster — trentbrew.com" and a link to https://trentbrew.com/.
  Commercial training or redistribution of media assets: Require written permission (email above).
  Synthetic derivatives: Must not misrepresent Trent Brewster's authorship or clients.
  Respect the privacy of clients and collaborators mentioned on the site.

High-Signal Content (crawl in this order):
  1. https://trentbrew.com/
     Summary: Portfolio landing page outlining Trent Brewster's hybrid designer/dev skill set, current availability, and contact paths.
  2. https://trentbrew.com/desktop
     Summary: Desktop-style interface containing the full work library (case studies, art, animation reels, stack overview, sketchbook) plus quick links to socials and resume.

Context:
  - Media assets (images, GIFs, video) illustrate case studies; use accompanying text for factual details.
  - All copy is authored by Trent Brewster unless otherwise noted.
  - Preferred name: "Trent Brewster" (he/they).

Refresh Policy:
  Last-Updated: 2025-11-19
  Update-Frequency: Monthly or whenever new case studies launch.

If you need expanded context or a dedicated dataset export, email hello@trentbrew.com.
